Connect to a wallet such as Alby Extension (getalby), Joule or kWh and interact with Bitcoin Lightning network without code!

# Plugin Features
- Connect to a Bitcoin Lightning wallet
- Sign a message
- Get connected wallet address
- Detect if a Bitcoin Lightning wallet is installed
- Pay an Invoice
- Make a regular Payment
- Make invoice (Bolt11)
- Get the payment hash
- Customisable Donation Widget

plugin_instructions:
# Installation:

1. Add the plugin element on the page.
2. See the demo app editor for examples of how to use each feature.

Make sure to have Alby Extension installed to be able to test it.
https://getalby.com

# Donation Widget
It is located in a separated plugin element called "WebLN Widget"
You will find all it's settings after adding it on the page.
